comments.body: This small change in the header of `com.intellij.openapi.diagnostic.ErrorReportSubmitter#submit` broke **source compatibility** — but not **binary compatibility**, since the new & old method types are still identical **after erasure**.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +25,29 @@      @Nullable String additionalInfo,
      Component parentComponent,
      Consumer<? super SubmittedReportInfo> consumer) {
    GuiUtils.invokeLaterIfNeeded(() -> BrowserUtil.browse(
        "https://github.com/VirtusLab/git-machete-intellij-plugin/issues/new?assignees=&labels=bug&template=bug_report.md"),
